How do ESM models contribute to the unde: They generate protein embeddings that capture comprehensive features, including 3D structures and interaction relationships.
They directly predict the binding affinities of proteins to various ligands.
They sequence protein genomes to identify functional domains.

It enhances the speed of protein sequence analysis.

It simplifies the process of protein purification.

Using CRISPR technology to edit phage genomes.

What is the primary function of the GOPh: To enhance the annotation of protein functions in bacteriophages by leveraging genomic context and machine learning models.
To design nanobody binders for SARS-CoV-2 using protein embeddings.
To predict the 3D structures of phage proteins using ESM models.
